662.question: Which language-pair had the better performance?

4-Table5-1.png: The English-French language-pair had a better performance with a BLEU score of 46.65 compared to the French-English language-pair which had a BLEU score of 47.26.</s>
The English-French language-pair had a better performance as it consistently scored higher on both BLEU and TER metrics across all test sets compared to the French-English language-pair.</s>
